sys_remote_update_set.description: Faster resolution for Security Incident Response (SIR) tickets by integrating with xMatters Flow Designer. Automatically contacts the Assignment Group via xMatters. Pre-Requisites 1 Everbridge Flow Designer app for ServiceNow, available from the ServiceNow store. 2 Access to an xMatters instance with admin rights. See xMatters labs on Github for installation notes.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sn_si_incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sn_si_incident">stateVALCHANGES^priorityIN1,2,3^NQassignment_groupVALCHANGES^priorityIN1,2,3^assignment_groupISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item display_value="1,2,3" endquery="false" field="priority" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="1,2,3"/><item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item display_value="1,2,3" endquery="false" field="priority" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="1,2,3"/><item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>xMatters SIR</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Set up config
	let myConfig = {
	"triggerProfile": "Security Incident",// N.B.Matches name in Trigger Profile
	"signalMode": "State",
	"alertPriority": "Medium"
	};

	// Overwrite signalMode for Assignment
	if (current.operation()=='update' && current.assignment_group.changes()){
		myConfig.signalMode=='Assignment';
	}

	// Overwrite xMatters alert priority
	if (current.priority==1){
		myConfig.alertPriority=='High';
	}

	// Call Everbridge Flow Designer client, passing in the config
	let FlowDesignerClient = new x_xma_eb_fd.EBClient(config = myConfig);
	FlowDesignerClient.triggerWorkflow(current, previous);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>richard.selby</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-25 15:14:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>79af52c483943210b4d2bfc6feaad31c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>xMatters SIR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Everbridge Flow Designer" source="x_xma_eb_fd">8018d948dbed56102b317f93e2961979</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Everbridge Flow Designer">8018d948dbed56102b317f93e2961979</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_79af52c483943210b4d2bfc6feaad31c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>richard.selby</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-25 16:03:08</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=79af52c483943210b4d2bfc6feaad31c"/></record_update>
